snippet: Two more abortion clinics were forced to close in Texas, and the state is moving on to the next phase of pressuring clinics.
abstract: Gail Collins Op-Ed column notes that closing of two abortion clinics in Texas means there are only six places where women can go to end a pregnancy in the state, unless a court intervenes; warns Texas is going further by requiring the clinics that remain to have facilities necessary for major surgical procedures.
lead_paragraph: Two more abortion clinics were forced to close in Texas, and the state is moving on to the next phase of pressuring clinics.
